Icon.Name: ID70084
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70084 -2346.86,8.99,-63.37 Leads back out to "Antonica".

Icon.Name: ID70085
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70085 -2513.06,15.67,-44.58 Scaling level 0^^^x2 - +1^^^x2 gnoll. - 1 of 5 curates that need to be defeated to spawn the Enraged Elemental Being.

Icon.Name: ID70086
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70086 -2530.00,16.00,-44.00 Scaling level +5^^^x2 wisp. - Spawns after defeating all 5 Sabertooth curates. - Upon defeat Vasha will become attackable.

Icon.Name: ID70087
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70087 -2528.44,15.67,-48.90 Scaling level 0^^^x2 gnoll. - Needed for the raid mission 'A Bold Confrontation'. - Becomes attackable upon defeating the Enraged Elemental Being. - Upon defeat a group of 2 Sabertooth protectors and a Sabertooth curate will spawn (scaling level +1^ gnolls).

Icon.Name: ID70088
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70088 -1193.52,-12.75,707.18 Leads back out to "Antonica".

Icon.Name: ID70089
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70089 -1112.08,-24.16,750.58 Scaling level 0^^^x2 - +2^^^x2 human. - It is ADVISED to defeat all the hired guards around the camp as Prince Minaja will otherwise call them to his aid. - Wanders from here north along the palisade and back.

Icon.Name: ID70090
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70090 -1089.82,-23.23,723.95 Scaling level +4^^^x2 kerra. - Grouped with High Guard Morel (scaling level +4^^^x2 human), High Guard Nien (scaling level +4^^^x2 barbarian) and Royal Accountant Fade (scaling level +4^x2 half elf). - Needed for the mission 'A Gallant Confrontation'. - It is ADVISED to defeat all the hired guards around the camp as Prince Minaja will otherwise call them to his aid. - Has a raidwide stun.

Icon.Name: ID70091
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70091 -1014.91,-19.38,512.50 Scaling level +4^^^x2 root horror. - Grouped with a strangleroot aggressor and a strangleroot weaver (scaling level +4^^^x2 treants).

Icon.Name: ID70092
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70092 -1256.68,-25.80,459.42 Scaling level +3^^^x2 root horror. - Grouped with a strangleroot butcher and a strangleroot weaver (scaling level +3^^^x2 treants).

Icon.Name: ID70093
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70093 -1285.15,-29.78,560.67 Scaling level +3^^^x2 root horror. - Grouped with a strangleroot agressor and a strangleroot butcher (scaling level +3^^^x2 treants).

Icon.Name: ID70094
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70094 -1139.68,-32.32,484.77 Scaling level +3^^^x2 root horror. - Needed for the mission 'A Gallant Confrontation'. - Has a raidwide stun and knockback it is ADVISED to fight it inside the tower.

Icon.Name: ID70117
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70117 -2516.58,15.85,-102.18 Scaling level +5^^^x2 human. - Needed for the city task 'A Lordly Confrontation'. - He and the Ambassadors of the Mist and Thicket need to defeated to make the Ambassador of the Grove attackable.

Icon.Name: ID70118
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70118 -2346.86,8.99,-63.37 Leads back out to "Antonica".

Icon.Name: ID70119
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70119 -2585.47,17.44,-31.70 Scaling level +3^^^x2 fairy. - Needed for the city task 'A Lordly Confrontation'. - This fairy, the Ambassador of the Thicket and Arch Protector Dolis need to defeated to make the Ambassador of the Grove attackable.

Icon.Name: ID70120
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70120 -2458.23,17.80,29.95 Scaling level +3^^^x2 dryad. - Needed for the city task 'A Lordly Confrontation'. - Please be ADVISED that the root horrors cast fears, so use a fear prevention or a pet to pull them away from the Ambassador. - She, the Ambassador of the Mist and Arch Protector Dolis need to defeated to make the Ambassador of the Grove attackable.

Icon.Name: ID70121
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70121 -2530.61,15.67,-45.41 Scaling level +2^^^x2 treant. - Needed for the city task 'A Lordly Confrontation'. - Becomes attackable upon defeating the Ambassadors of the Mist and Thicket as well as Arch Protector Dolis. - Stay outside of his AoE range, use the devices to poison the adds and keep an eye on your buffs as he debuffs them.

Icon.Name: ID70122
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70122 -2537.87,16.98,-49.08 Crank this machine to dispense poison into the ground to be able to deal with the adds that spawn during the fight with the Ambassador of the Grove.

Icon.Name: ID70123
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70123 -2516.47,17.34,-41.42 Crank this machine to dispense poison into the ground to be able to deal with the adds that spawn during the fight with the Ambassador of the Grove.

Icon.Name: ID70111
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70111 -108.20,-12.28,1018.03 Leads back out to "The Thundering Steppes".

Icon.Name: ID70112
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70112 -194.98,-21.75,1201.31 Scaling level +2^^^x2 ratonga ghost. - Grouped with Brinebender <Wind Jammer's Mess Cook> (scaling level +2 x2 half elf ghost). - Stuns. - Upon defeat Saltwater Saul will become attackable.

Icon.Name: ID70113
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70113 -278.62,-21.39,1175.96 Scaling level +3^^^x2 human. - Grouped with 5 infested scavengers (scaling level +3 x2 rats). - Needed for the city task 'A Heroic Confrontation'. - Become attackable upon defeating Navigator Nina. - Stuns. - Upon defeat Hairaza Sollen will let 4 spectral sailors loose on you.

Icon.Name: ID70114
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70114 -158.00,-22.07,1163.00 Group of 4 scaling level 0^^^x2 ghosts. - They are sent to attack you by Hairaza Sollen upon defeating Saltwater Saul. - Upon defeat Hairaza Sollen will summon Kor'allaztaraka the Feared to attack you.

Icon.Name: ID70115
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70115 -192.00,-21.77,1168.80 Scaling level +4^^^x2 amygdalan. - Needed for the city task 'A Heroic Confrontation'. - Sent to attack you by Hairaza Sollen upon defeating the 4 spectral sailors. - Upon defeat Hairaza Sollen will attack you herself.

Icon.Name: ID70116
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70116 -155.62,-22.36,1170.97 Scaling level +3^^^x2 dark elf. - Needed for the city task 'A Heroic Confrontation'. - Attacks you upon defeating the Kor'allaztaraka the Feared. - Has a disease AoE.

Icon.Name: ID70095
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70095 -5.45,-48.31,730.10 Leads back out to "The Commonlands".

Icon.Name: ID70096
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70096 22.65,-30.09,811.03 Scaling level +1^^^x2 orc. - If he sees you he'll send a constant stream of pairs of Bloodskulls (scaling level 0^-+2^ orcs) to you until he is defeated.

Icon.Name: ID70097
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70097 -38.11,-47.99,772.98 When you reach this point the first Bloodskull spotter will see you and start sending pairs of Bloodskulls (scaling level 0^-+2^ orcs) to you until he is defeated.

Icon.Name: ID70098
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70098 21.52,-29.89,802.35 Scaling level 0^^^x2 - +1^^^x2 orc. - These will engage in shooting arrows at group members if any orc is defeated in their far vicinity.

Icon.Name: ID70099
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70099 135.07,-45.42,908.21 Scaling level +2^^^x2 orc. - Grouped with a Bloodskull grunt (scaling level 72^^x2 orc).

Icon.Name: ID70100
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70100 114.93,-29.10,913.96 Scaling level +1^^^x2 orc. - If he sees you he'll send a constant stream of pairs of Bloodskulls (scaling level 0^-+2^ orcs) to you until he is defeated.

Icon.Name: ID70101
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70101 239.44,-41.49,788.77 Scaling level +4^^^x2 orc. - Needed for the city task 'A Noble Confrontation'. - Grouped with a Bloodskull grunt (scaling level +4^^^x2 orc). - He has a mental based AoE called Rallying Cry.

Icon.Name: ID70102
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70102 286.85,-47.99,812.73 Scaling level +3^^^x2 human. - Needed for the city writ 'A Noble Confrontation'. - Grouped with 2 exiled mercenaries (scaling level +3^^^x2 orcs). - Has an extra AoE as long as Commander Gorzok hasn't been defeated yet.

Icon.Name: ID70105
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70105 862.20,-18.31,579.97 Leads back out to "The Commonlands".

Icon.Name: ID70106
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70106 772.96,-53.14,593.69 Scaling level +4^^^x2 erudite. - Grouped with a fallen defender, a fallen mercenary and 2 fallen sorcerers (scaling level +4^x2 skeletons). - 1 of 4 Sisters that need to defeated to make Mother Znedari attackable.

Icon.Name: ID70107
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70107 810.47,-53.02,532.71 Scaling level +3^^^x2 erudite. - Grouped with a fallen counselor, 2 fallen defenders and a fallen sorcerer (scaling level +3^x2 skeletons). - 1 of 4 Sisters that need to defeated to make Mother Znedari attackable.

Icon.Name: ID70108
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70108 847.12,-53.06,618.12 Scaling level +4^^^x2 erudite. - Grouped with 3 fallen counselors and a fallen mercenary (scaling level +4^x2 skeletons). - 1 of 4 Sisters that need to defeated to make Mother Znedari attackable.

Icon.Name: ID70109
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70109 831.00,-52.88,658.00 Scaling level +2^^^x2 erudite. - Grouped with 2 fallen defenders and 2 fallen sorcerers (scaling level +2^x2 skeletons). - 1 of 4 Sisters that need to defeated to make Mother Znedari attackable.

Icon.Name: ID70110
Icon.PoiDescription: ID:70110 763.04,-52.80,678.00 Scaling level +2^^^x2 erudite. - The 2 rotting bodyguards (scaling level +2^^^x2 skeletons) arouse social aggro from Znedari when pulled. - Needed for the city writ 'A Daring Confrontation'. - Becomes attackable once all 4 sisters have been defeated.
